body:
It currently looks [like this](https://web.archive.org/web/20200806150145/https://ruqqus.com/)

It has 4 buttons:

* [Unlock Patron Titles](https://ruqqus.com/settings#patreon)
* [Awesome T-Shirts](https://www.bonfire.com/store/ruqqus/)
* [Custom Stickers](https://gumroad.com/l/XpCXQ)
* [Contribute Code](https://github.com/ruqqus/ruqqus)
body_html:
It currently looks like this

It has 4 buttons:

  • Unlock Patron Titles
  • Awesome T-Shirts
  • Custom Stickers
  • Contribute Code

guild.description:
Changes that aren't announced in +changelog or +ruqqus

Post whatever you notice (it doesn't have to be an important change, even changes in punctuation/spelling are ok)

https://github.com/ruqqus/ruqqus

Update on 2021-01-29:

If you want to be the GM of this guild, make a post here.
